verbs.description: President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un [V: are] set to meet face to face in Singapore to discuss denuclearization of the Korean peninsula .
[ARG1: President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] are [V: set] [ARG2: to meet face to face in Singapore to discuss denuclearization of the Korean peninsula] .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] are set to [V: meet] [ARGM-MNR: face to face] [ARGM-LOC: in Singapore] [ARGM-PRP: to discuss denuclearization of the Korean peninsula] .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] are set to meet face to face in Singapore to [V: discuss] [ARG1: denuclearization of the Korean peninsula] .
